zhcn_desc: §E§H工程研究§!（£engineering£）用于研究新科技。以下方式可以增加产出：\n§Y1.§!在我们的殖民地中建造£building£ §H研究实验室§!。\n§Y2.§!使用§H工程船§!在某些行星或恒星附近建造§H研究站§!。§!
en_desc: §E§HEngineering Research§! (£engineering£) is used to research new technologies. We can increase our output by: \n§Y1.§! Building £building£ §HResearch Labs§! buildings on our colonies.\n§Y2.§! Using §HConstruction Ships§! to build §HResearch Stations§! around certain planets or stars.§!
